name: impede
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make it more difficult for something to happen or more difficult for someone to do something: Although he's shy, it certainly hasn't impeded his career in any way.

See more results »
Add to word list
Add to word list
to slow something down or prevent an activity from making progress at its previous rate: Shortages of medicine were impeding the effort to control diseases.
